verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise the Lord, O servants of the Lord Praise the name of the Lord Bless His name, from this time forth And forevermore{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who is like the Lord our God Who dwells on high Who humbles Himself to behold the things In heaven and in the earth? x2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He raises the poor out of the dust And lifts the needy from the ashes To seat him with princes He grants the barren a home Like a joyful mother{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who is like the Lord our God Who dwells on high Who humbles Himself to behold the things In heaven and in the earth? x2{/lang-eng}
